com.linecorp.armeria.server

Interface DecoratingServiceFunction<I extends Request,O extends Response>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the Request type
    O - the Response type
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface DecoratingServiceFunction<I extends Request,O extends Response>
    A functional interface that enables building a DecoratingService with Service.decorate(DecoratingServiceFunction).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      O serve(Service<I,O> delegate, ServiceRequestContext ctx, I req)
      Serves an incoming Request.

    • Method Detail

      • serve

        O serve(Service<I,O> delegate,
        ServiceRequestContext ctx,
        I req)
 throws java.lang.Exception
        Serves an incoming Request.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the Service being decorated by this function
        ctx - the context of the received Request
        req - the received Request
        Returns:
        the Response
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
